properties.definition: The Celsius scale is an absolute scale of temperature, where 0 °C is the freezing point of water and 100 °C is the boiling point of water at 1 atm pressure.

unit: micromoles per square meter per second

properties.definition: A unit of measure for photosynthetic photon flux density (PPFD), representing the number of photons in the photosynthetically active range falling on a square meter every second.
The ratio of the volume of water to the total volume of the soil.
